channel.title: Sponsor Bidding
channel.description:
just a little question i have about bidding, i will not go into specific details as im sure mopar doesnt want me to display whats going on during the bids because its obviously set to private for a reason. anyways, all gratitude to tom for accepting my late application to bid for mopar sponsorship, but im quite confused on how bidding works. yesterday after being accepted, i bidded enough to get myself to the top10 of the "current bids" list, but it did not display my bid. i bidded before a guy and his bid showed up, just probably something wrong cuz i was added late. dont wanna miss out incase anything goes wrong on the tenth.
i do not see anything that allows me to bid.. all i see is a paypal button and i was just told this was not the button to bid, but a button to pay a $5 fee. i read this on the page that i would have to pay the non refundable $5 and then be able to bid, but after doing that, i saw no way to bid, so i just went ahead and thought that was the way to do it..
http://prntscr.com/1k3g3h
this is proof ive paid the fee and even more than that because i thought it was the way to bid.
http://prntscr.com/1k9tcy

item.title: Sponsor Bidding
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I love how he does this and then spams advertisement on the status page.[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:14, topic:528195”]

LPMLxNk.png924×491
[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsor Bidding
item.dc:creator: @DivineFate DivineFate
item.description:
@DivineFate wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I’ve fixed this manually and am refunding you all but one of the $5. I think the problem was on paypal’s end, because someone paid after you and it worked just fine. Weird.

Awesome, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsor Bidding
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’ve fixed this manually and am refunding you all but one of the $5. I think the problem was on paypal’s end, because someone paid after you and it worked just fine. Weird.

item.title: Sponsor Bidding
item.dc:creator: @DivineFate DivineFate
item.description:
@DivineFate wrote:

[quote=“Relvok, post:11, topic:527494”]After paying the $5 it should display a input box on the page to enter your bid, from your print screen however I can see it hasn’t displayed for you.

There is obviously a problem.[/quote]

Thanks for the reply, kinda sucks as I still don’t see the box and I don’t really wanna pay another $5 fee because I’ve already sent in more than what was expected.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsor Bidding
item.dc:creator: @Relvok Relvok
item.description:
@Relvok wrote:

After paying the $5 it should display a input box on the page to enter your bid, from your print screen however I can see it hasn’t displayed for you.

There is obviously a problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsor Bidding
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I’d presume that the bidding period may now be over, rendering you unable to bid. However I’m not sure as I’ve never bid on a space.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsor Bidding
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t actually know, I never paid the 5 dollars

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsor Bidding
item.dc:creator: @DivineFate DivineFate
item.description:
@DivineFate wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:527494”][quote author=DivineFate link=topic=646246.msg4346299#msg4346299 date=1375924619]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=646246.msg4346297#msg4346297 date=1375924216]

just a little question i have about bidding, i will not go into specific details as im sure mopar doesnt want me to display whats going on during the bids because its obviously set to private for a reason. anyways, all gratitude to tom for accepting my late application to bid for mopar sponsorship, but im quite confused on how bidding works. yesterday after being accepted, i bidded enough to get myself to the top10 of the “current bids” list, but it did not display my bid. i bidded before a guy and his bid showed up, just probably something wrong cuz i was added late. dont wanna miss out incase anything goes wrong on the tenth.

Again PM either Tom, Taharok or Moparisthebest. Stop making threads about the sponsor system because no one except them can do anything about it.

I am aware of this, but I wouldn’t wanna bother them too much. And these threads were made for the higher ups…
[/quote]If you’re making threads for small specific groups of people, just pm them… this is a public board. Even mods can’t do anything with the SSP bidding page.

But did you try to resubmit your bid? Also make sure your $5 pre-bid fee went through properly

Since the button that’s used to bid only allows you to bid $5 at a time, I’ve bidded about 7 times = $35
[/quote]thats not the bid button… thats a 5 dollar fee you pay to be able to place your normal bid. You have to ask MITB to refund 6 of those[/quote]

Wow… Face palm… How would I place a bid? I don’t see any sort of button

Read full topic

Since the button that’s used to bid only allows you to bid $5 at a time, I’ve bidded about 7 times = $35[/quote]thats not the bid button… thats a 5 dollar fee you pay to be able to place your normal bid. You have to ask MITB to refund 6 of those
